testcase.classname: US_01 User must be able to access Amazon.com page
testcase.name: US_02_TC_001 User must be able to login with valid information (positive)
testcase.system-out: When User goes to url.......................................................passed Then Clicks the sign in button on the Account & Lists article...............passed Then Enters the valid data into the e-mail box and click the continue button..passed Then Enters the valid data in the password box and click the sign in button..passed Then The user logs in successfully..........................................passed And Closes the page.........................................................passed
